description: A fixed-structure Marketing Kit template with a consistent section order, component system, and style tokens. Content is supplied separately per client. Adds a strict authoring contract for opening Markdown tables, Excludess.

source_reference.notes: Style and layout derived from the Swift Innovation PDF example.

rules: Avoid the em dash character in output. Use commas or hyphens instead.
Prefer clean whitespace, simple grids, and consistent hierarchy.
Bullets use filled circles for standard lists; arrow bullets are reserved for Key Findings.

placeholder_policy.missing_info_handling: If required data is missing, keep [FILL] in opening tables only. Proceed with neutral phrasing in narrative copy. Do not add a gaps list section.

inputs_handling_rules.website_copy_rule: Only use website copy that is pasted in inputs. URLs without pasted text are treated as unknown.
inputs_handling_rules.evidence_rule: Pull proof lines, metrics, and quotes exactly as pasted. Do not paraphrase numbers.
inputs_handling_rules.redaction_rule: If sensitive items are redacted, do not infer. Mark as [FILL] in opening tables.

missing_input_policy.guidance: If information is missing, use [FILL] only in the first two tables. Do not include an gaps list section. In narrative sections, use neutral phrasing and avoid inventing facts.
